lecho.lib.hellocharts.model

Class Column

  • java.lang.Object
    • lecho.lib.hellocharts.model.Column

  • public class Column
extends java.lang.Object
    Single column for ColumnChart. One column can be divided into multiple sub-columns(ColumnValues) especially for stacked ColumnChart.

    Note: you can set X value for columns or sub-columns, columns are by default indexed from 0 to numOfColumns-1 and column index is used as column X value, so first column has X value 0, second clumn has X value 1 etc. If you want to display AxisValue for given column you should initialize AxisValue with X value of that column.
